text: Yemwe abemeye! Muziririjwe kuzungura abagore ku gahato, kandi ntimukabagore kugira ngo mubambure bimwe mu byo mwabahaye; keretse baramutse bakoze icyaha kigaragara (ubusambanyi cyangwa gusuzugura abagabo babo), kandi mujye mubana na bo neza. Nimubanga, hari ubwo mwakwanga ikintu Allah akaba ari cyo ashyiramo imigisha myinshi
